name: Sonnet Xu
headline: Stanford CS & AI | LLMs @ Amazon, Stanford
about:
I work on generative AI research at Stanford and develop LLM tooling for diverse applications in research, venture, and industry. My experience spans generative AI, civil and technical AI ethics, as well as environmental robotics and medical research. Excited to tackle complex challenges where technology meets society.

experiences.title: Generative AI Developer
experiences.description: Developed a generative AI urban design platform to empower citizens in city planning. Users could generate, customize, and review images of city elements like bus stops and centers, using prompts or reference images. Implemented a history log for feedback, enabling meaningful community input to planners. This project combined AI, UI design, and community engagement, leveraging technology to democratize urban planning.
